text: St. Francis River is a river that feeds into the Mississippi River. It is about long,U.S. Geological Survey. National Hydrography Dataset high- resolution flowline data. The National Map , accessed March 9, 2011 and is located in southeastern Missouri and northeastern Arkansas in the United States. The river drains a mostly rural area and forms part of the Missouri- Arkansas state line along the western side of the Missouri Bootheel. == Other websites == * Maps of Former St. Francis Lake in Northeast Arkansas ==References== Category:Rivers of Arkansas Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: St. Francis River
